text: The 18th Cruiser Squadron was a formation of cruisers of the Royal Navy from 1939 to 1942. The squadron was formed in September 1939 and was assigned to the Home Fleet until it was disbanded in October 1942. It included . == Commanders == Included: {| class="wikitable" ! !! Rank !! Flag !! Name !! Term !!
